push.name: Push-up
push.instructions: Keep your body straight and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

push.name: Bench Press
push.instructions: Lie on the bench with a barbell and push it up until your arms are straight, then lower it back to your chest.

push.name: Overhead Press
push.instructions: Stand with a barbell at shoulder height and press it overhead until your arms are straight.

pull.name: Pull-up
pull.instructions: Hang from a bar with your hands shoulder-width apart and pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.

pull.name: Bent Over Row
pull.instructions: Bend at the waist with a barbell and pull it to your lower chest.

pull.name: Deadlift
pull.instructions: Lift a barbell from the floor to hip height, keeping your back straight and core engaged.

dietary_recommendations.pre_workout: Consume a mix of protein and carbohydrates 30 minutes to an hour before your workout. Examples: a banana with peanut butter, yogurt with berries, or a protein shake.
dietary_recommendations.post_workout: Have a meal with protein and carbohydrates within 2 hours after your workout. Examples: grilled chicken with quinoa, a smoothie with protein powder, or a turkey sandwich on whole-grain bread.
